home.title: RetroShift
home.heroSubtitle: Your team stays quiet. The usual suspects talk too much. Real feedback goes unsaid.
home.heroSolution: RetroShift fixes this: anonymous feedback, async, no awkward silences.

home.pain2Desc: Two people talk, everyone else stays quiet.
home.pain3Desc: Nobody says what they really think.
home.solution1Desc: Your team writes what they really think. No names, no judgment.
home.solution2Desc: No forced calls. Everyone responds when they have time to reflect.
home.solution3Desc: See patterns, not personalities. Focus on real issues.
home.step1Desc: Pick a format, give it a name. 30 seconds.
home.step2Desc: Slack, Teams, email. Team doesn't need to sign up.
home.step3Desc: See responses in real-time. Anonymous and honest.
home.comp1: Enterprise tools cost $10+/user/month â€” and you don't need 90% of the features
home.comp2: Most tools require accounts for everyone â€” friction kills participation
home.comp3: Shared boards aren't truly anonymous â€” you can see who writes what
home.comparisonConclusion: RetroShift: one link, zero logins, real anonymity.
home.faq1A: Yes. We don't track IPs, don't require logins. Even we don't know who wrote what.
home.faq2Q: Does my team need to create an account?
home.faq2A: No. They get a link, click, write. Done.
home.faq3Q: Can I use it for distributed teams?
home.faq3A: It's built for that. Async = different timezones, no problem.
home.faq4A: EU hosting, encrypted database, no selling data to third parties.
home.finalCta: Ready to find out what your team really thinks?
